name: Water Search
description:
Water hunters have also reached these parts. Peaceful coexistence is broken, all the water is with the evil monsters. You are obliged to punish the villains and return the water to the locals. But everything is not as simple as it seems.

Water Search - Top Down Shooter, in this game you need to destroy all those who have deprived access to water. Use melee and ranged combat to deal with the problem. Enemies are not so simple, you need to be extremely accurate and dexterous.

Game Features:
- hardcore
- Pixel Art
- Variety of levels
